thread.title: CeeLo Green's Grammy Look Confuses Everybody
thread.title_full: CeeLo Green's Grammy Look Confuses Everybody | Complex

author: Shawn Setaro
title: CeeLo Green's Grammy Look Confuses Everybody
text:
CeeLo Green's Grammy Look Confuses Everybody By Shawn Setaro Shawn is the host of The Cipher , a critically acclaimed hip-hop podcast that conducts in-depth interviews with the genreâ€™s most interesting and important figures. He is a regular contributor at Forbes .
Shawn is also the former editor-in-chief of Rap Genius, and has written about music and culture for The Atlantic, Vibe, The Source, GQ, Esquire, The Sondheim Review, and more.
Feb 13, 2017 Share Tweet 0 Image via Getty/John Shearer Even before the Grammy Awards began on Sunday night, there was already one show-stopping moment. CeeLo Green showed up for the red carpet in an all-gold outfit and a robot-style mask, a robot-style outfit some are dubbing "CeeLo 3PO."
SPOTTED: @CeeLoGreen on the GRAMMY Red Carpet #GRAMMYs #GRAMMYLive https://t.co/q6PZtFcYjZ pic.twitter.com/lzZnCWDW6w
â€” Recording Academy (@RecordingAcad) February 13, 2017 As soon as the first pictures of the outfit hit the internet, the confusionâ€”and, of course, the mockeryâ€”started.
Cee lo look like da last boss you gotta fight on a video game pic.twitter.com/eUYTQMWKsn
â€” idisdummies (@Dont__BeStupid) February 13, 2017 Cee Lo Green pulled up the Grammys like a youth basketball participation trophy that left its ball at the crib... smh pic.twitter.com/qUKfHWJHrV
â€” Jrue-Tang Forever (@SteadyLosing) February 13, 2017 When the molly hits pic.twitter.com/tWYDF9vmTK
â€” CJ Fogler (@cjzero) February 13, 2017 Cee Lo Green is what happens when a Los Conquistador eats the other #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/Xeg2Xj8V4d
â€” Youcef (@YusevCrush) February 13, 2017 that exploding phone was apparently Cee-Lo's supervillain origin story pic.twitter.com/mFjYXm203t
â€” Al Shipley (@alshipley) February 13, 2017 CeeLo is at the #GRAMMYs dressed like a Power Rangers villain pic.twitter.com/bWxdQZmX7i
â€” Philip Lewis (@Phil_Lewis_) February 13, 2017 This is just too good:
I edited Ceelo Green into the background of pics of Trump in his apartment and holy shit ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ pic.twitter.com/VurY7DMJ1w
â€” Jesse McLaren (@McJesse) February 13, 2017 And if worlds weren't already colliding in music, Golddust decided to challenge CeeLo to match at Wrestlemania 33:
Hey @CeeLoGreen I got your number! #WrestleMania #AllThatGlittersIsGold . @wwe pic.twitter.com/8fjzZAswBG
â€” Dustin Rhodes (@Goldust) February 13, 2017
In an interview with Complex , CeeLo dropped hints at this new character could be his alter-ego Gnarly Davidson. Only time will tell if it has anything to do wit his upcoming project . We will keep you updated as more information becomes available.
